set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "ON" );
set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "ON" );
sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE_NOATTENUATE, "sound/misc/events/micro_beeps.mp3" );

task ( "use" )
{
	set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Use microwave" );
}

dowait ( "use" );
set ( "SET_SEARCH", < 30.000 50.000 0.000 > );
